abstract: Accoona is a Jersey City search company named after the Swahili phrase “Hakuna Matata” memorialized by Walt Disney in the Lion King that roughly means “no worries.”
lead_paragraph: Accoona is a Jersey City search company named after the Swahili phrase “Hakuna Matata” memorialized by Walt Disney in the Lion King that roughly means “no worries.”

headline.main: Accoona Shrinks To Focus on Twing

abstract: Accoona, the Jersey City, N.J., search engine and electronics store, has made significant layoffs as it scales back several of its product lines in order to preserve cash and concentrate on its new offering, Twing, a search engine for message boards.
snippet: Accoona, the Jersey City, N.J., search engine and electronics store, has made significant layoffs as it scales back several of its product lines in order to preserve cash and concentrate on its new offering, Twing, a search engine for message boar...
lead_paragraph: Accoona is a Jersey City Internet search company named after the Swahili phrase “Hakuna Matata,” translated in the Disney movie The Lion King as meaning “no worries.”

headline.main: Accoona Shrinks to Focus on Twing

abstract: Betting that audiences are hungry for nature documentaries, the Walt Disney Company has created a new production banner to deliver two nature films a year starting in 2009.
snippet: Betting that audiences are hungry for nature documentaries, the Walt Disney Company has created a new production banner to deliver two nature films a year starting in 2009.

headline.main: Disney Looks to Nature, and Creates a Film Division to Capture It
headline.print_headline: Disney Looks to Nature, and Creates a Film Division to Capture It
